channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 24, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-24-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
We've got sessions from the week's Gauntlet Hangouts games plus a ton of videos from last weekend's Gauntlet Community Open Gaming event! (With more still to come!) Thanks go out to all the facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
